pages.text:
View Full Beer List
Order Now
Now Open in the Persimmon Hill neighborhood,
Smitty’s Taphouse & Grill
is the passion of a longtime Tallahassee resident and his family.
Smitty’s
reflects a deep appreciation for fine craft beers and tasty bar eats, elevated by a passion for great customer service. Proprietor-owned and operated, this local neighborhood pub features a friendly atmosphere inside that is welcoming to all and an amazing outdoor area as well.
Come up and see us. We want to share our place with you!
Sign Up for Our Emails
and follow us on social . . .
Smitty's Taphouse & Grill
Opening Late Spring 2021
Follow
Follow
Follow
HOURS:
Sunday-Wednesday
: 11am – 9pm
Thursday
-Saturday
: 11am – 10pm
Smitty's Taphouse & Grill
Opening Late Spring 2021
Starters
Homemade Pretzel
$11.49
C’mon, we’re a beer hall so this was a given! Treat yourself to our delicious homemade pretzel served with a side of spicy mustard and your choice of housemade beer cheese, cream cheese, Calabrian marinara, or chocolate sauce. Additional sauces –
$1
Chips ‘n Dip
$9.99
A tray full of our house cooked potato chips served with your choice of one of our housemade dips, French onion or spicy cherry pepper.
Hummus
$9.99
Housemade hummus topped with feta cheese, kalamata olives, seasoned crostini. Substitute cucumber slices to make it gluten free.
Volcano Shrimp
$11.99
Leave the “Bang, bang” and the “Boom, boom” behind and experience something new! Six jumbo shrimp sauteed in a spicy concoction and served on seasoned crostini.
Served with a side of homemade jalapeno jelly.
Mozzarella Sticks
$10.99
Hand cut sticks of creamy mozzarella coated in Panko breadcrumbs then fried to a golden brown and served with our  Calabrian marinara sauce for dipping.
French Bread Pizza
$9.99
Made with our fresh Baguettes, we apply our Calabrian Marinara Sauce and top it with milky shredded Mozzarella Cheese then baked to perfection. Available with Cheese or Pepperoni.
Slider Flight
Pick Any Combo! Cheeseburger, chicken (grilled or fried), B.L.T., or grouper (grilled or blackened). Pair with a beer flight for the ultimate experience!
Burger –
$4.95
Fried Chicken –
$4.95
Grilled Chicken –
$4.95
Grouper –
$6.75
BLT –
$4.50
Nachos & Wings
Nachos
$12.99
Housemade potato chips topped with chipotle cheese sauce, pico de Gallo, lime crema, jalapeno peppers, and fried onions.
Add Chicken
–
$4
or Steak
–
$5
Wings
$16.99
8 fresh never frozen jumbo chicken wings tossed in one of our signature sauces –
Medium
/
Volcano
/
Sweet BBQ
/ Steel Curtain / Teriyaki Heat
. Comes with celery and carrots and your choice of ranch or blue cheese. Additional sauces or dressings –
$1
Salads & Chili
Your choice of one of our homemade dressings – Honey Lime Vinaigrette, Ranch, Blue Cheese, Honey Mustard, Ginger Sesame, or Blue Cheese Vinaigrette
House
$11.99
Romaine hearts topped with chopped applewood smoked bacon, baby heirloom tomatoes, English cucumbers, red onion, and shredded cheddar cheese.
Add Chicken
–
$4
or Jumbo Grilled Shrimp
–
$6
Caesar
$14.99
Romaine hearts tossed in homemade Caesar dressing, topped with housemade croutons.
Add Chicken
–
$4
or Jumbo Grilled Shrimp
–
$6
Crispy Chicken
$15.99
Romaine lettuce topped with shredded carrots, housemade marinated cucumbers, baby heirloom tomatoes, fried wontons, crispy fried chicken and ﬁnished off with a wasabi drizzle and toasted sesame seeds. Served with our housemade ginger sesame dressing.
Burgers
Pub Burger
$13.89
Our signature burger made from ground chuck, brisket, and short rib cooked to order then topped with leafy romaine, sliced tomato, and red onion.
Add Cheese
–
$1
It’s on Fire!
$14.99
Our famous CBS patty infused with chipotle tabasco, cooked to order, then topped with jalapeño cream cheese or ghost pepper cheese, leafy romaine, sliced tomato, red onion, and roasted jalapeños.
Falafel Burger
$12.99
Housemade falafel patty cooked then topped with leafy romaine, sliced tomato, English cucumber, roasted red peppers, feta cheese, our housemade hummus and minted yogurt, served on a brioche bun.
Cheese, Louise!
$15.99
Our famous CBS patty cooked to order topped with leafy romaine, sliced tomato, and red onion and served on two grilled cheese sandwiches and a side of our housemade Beer cheese. Upgrade to the
Big Bertha!
– add a third grilled cheese sandwich and second patty for the ultimate burger experience!
$22.99
BURGER TEMP CHART
Rare:
Cool Red Center |
Med. Rare:
Warm Red Center |
Medium:
Pink with Slight Touch of Red
Med. Well:
Brown with Slight Touch of Pink |
Well Done:
Brown Throughout
Cheesesteaks
Chipotle
$14.49
Shaved and grilled ribeye piled high and topped with housemade chipotle cheese sauce, hot cherry peppers, provolone cheese, and fried onions.
Korean
$14.49
Shaved and bulgogi marinated ribeye grilled with red onions, sliced jalapenos topped with mayo, marinated cucumbers, melted Monterey Jack, kimchi, and toasted sesame seeds.
Classic
$13.99
Shaved and grilled ribeye piled high, mixed with peppers and onions, then topped with melted provolone cheese. Served with mayonnaise on our fresh hoagie roll.
Handhelds
Ribeye Sandwich
$18.49
6oz Grilled Black Angus ribeye cooked medium then topped with caramelized onions, Swiss cheese and Smitty’s ribeye sauce served on a toasted brioche bun.
Roast Beef Sandwich
$14.99
Seasoned and thinly sliced roast beef topped with caramelized onions, house made remoulade sauce, and hot cream cheese served on a fresh ciabatta roll and a side of au jus.
Pork Schnitzel Sandwich
$14.99
A center cut pork chop pounded thin, hand breaded, and fried to perfection. Served on a buttery brioche bun with house bread & butter pickles and our bacon and onion aioli.
Crispy Chicken
$14.99
Hand-breaded deep-fried chicken breast topped with dijonnaise, house pickles, and apple jalapeno slaw served on a brioche bun.
Add Bacon for
$2
.
Buffalo Chicken
$14.99
Hand-breaded deep-fried chicken tenderloin nuggets spun in our medium or volcano sauce and piled high in a fresh sub roll along with leafy romaine, sliced tomato. Topped with a drizzle of our homemade ranch or blue cheese. Available as a wrap.
Chicken Tenders
$14.99
Four hand-breaded chicken tenderloins fried golden brown and a choice of dressing for dipping – honey mustard, ranch, or smoky BBQ.
Five Cheese Grilled Cheese
$11.99
Parmesan-crusted sour dough bread loaded with cheddar, ricotta, Swiss, and American cheeses served with a side of Calabrian marinara sauce.
Add burger patty
–
$5
Pub Dog
$11.49
A quarter pound all beef Black Angus hot dog scored and deep fried then placed in a fresh pretzel bun, served with a side of Smitty’s hot dog sauce.
Add a second Dog for
$5
Grouper Sandwich
$16.99
A delicious grouper ﬁlet with our tartar sauce, leafy romaine, sliced tomato, and red onion served on a buttery brioche bun. Served grilled or blackened.
Entrees
Pasta Florentine
$16.29
Tender penne pasta mixed with our savory housemade cream sauce, baby heirloom tomatoes, and fresh spinach then topped with a perfectly seasoned and grilled chicken breast. Served with a side salad.
Available with gluten free pasta for
$2
Pork Chops
$19.99
Two fork-tender, bone-in center cut pork chops seasoned and chargrilled to perfection. Served with a side salad and your choice of a Smitty’s side.
One Chop Dinner
–
$14.99
Munich Roasted Chicken
$21.49
A half chicken seasoned and roasted to a mouth-watering goodness. Served with a side salad and your choice of a Smitty’s side.
*Available after 5:00 PM
Snapper
$19.99
Filet of wild caught, skin-on snapper seasoned and grilled to perfection. Served with a side salad and your choice of a Smitty’s side.
Smitty’s Sides
$4.29 Each
French Fries
House Cooked Potato Chips
Apple Jalapeno Slaw
Ginger Sesame Slaw
Mexican Street Corn
Mixed Fruit
Steamed Broccoli
Smashed Potatoes
Mac & Cheese
Kids Menu
Burger
(with fries or chips)
$6.49
Grilled Cheese
(with fries or chips)
$5.49
Chicken Tenders
(with fries or chips)
$6.99
French Bread Pizza
$5.49
A $2 fee will be charged for anyone over 12. Substitute any side –
$1
Desserts
Ice Cream
$4.99
Three scoops of Blue Bunny Vanilla Ice Cream.
Cinnamon Pretzel Bites
$9.49
Bite-sized pieces of our housemade pretzel dough baked then tossed in butter and cinnamon & sugar. Served with our homemade cream cheese dipping sauce
Ask your server about additional dessert options!
Beverages
Coke Products
$3.09
Coke, Diet Coke, Coke Zero, Sprite, Minute Maid Lemonade, Powerade, Barq’s Root Beer
Dr. Pepper
$3.09
Fresh-brewed Iced-T
$2.99
Kid’s Milk
(no refills)
$1.99
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
A 20% gratuity will be added to parties of 8 or more.
Specialty Cocktails
319
$9
Bourbon, Honey, Lemon, Fresh Mint, Topped with Ginger
Peach Palmer
$10
Bourbon, Peach, House Sour, Unsweet Tea, Simple Syrup
Apples & Oranges
$9
Stoli Orange Vodka, Orange Juice, Apple Liqueur Orange Bitters, Cranberry
Porch Punch
$9
Stoli Razpberry Vodka, Peach Liqueur, Fresh Juices
Fresh Air
$9
Cachaca, Fresh Limes, Agave, Ginger Beer
On The Boat
$9
Panama Pacific Aged Rum, Mint Symple Syrup Pineapple, Orange and Cherry
Hot Days
$9
Botanical Gin, Elderflower Liqueur, House Sour, Topped with Soda
New Fashion
$12
Barrel Aged Tequila, Agave, Bitters, Cherry and Orange Garnish
Never Lose Your Sparkle
$12
G-4 Blanco, Triple Sec, House Sour Splash of Grenadine & Blue Caracao
White Blazer
$10
Elderflower Liqueur, Lemon, Simple Syrup, Basil
Live Like Sam
$12
Lemon, Simple, Peychaud’s Bitter, Cranberry
Classic Cocktails
Old Fashion
$8 – $12
Bourbon/Whiskey, Agave, Bitters, Cherry and Orange Garnish
NY Sour
$9
Rye Whiskey, Sour, Malbec Floater
Manhattan
$10
Rye Whiskey, Sweet Vermouth, Bitters
Cosmopolitan
$9
Vodka, Triple Sec, Lime, Cranberry
Mule
$8
Vodka, Lime, Ginger Beer
Caipirinha
$9
White Rum, Muddled Lime, Agave, Soda
Tom Collins
$9
Gin, Lemon, Simple Syrup, Soda, Lemon Garnish
French 75
$10
Gin, Lemon, Simple Syrup, Prosecco
Spicy Paloma
$9
Tequila, Lime, Grapefruit, Muddled Jalapeno, Simple Syrup, Soda
Margarita
$8
Tequila, Lime, Agave, House Sour
Wine
Prosecco Rose
$10/36
Tiamo, Prosecco DOC, IT
Riesling
$8/28
Clean Slate, Mosel, Germany
Pinot Grigio
$8/28
Riff, Venezie DOC, IT
Sauvignon Blanc
$10/36
Villa Maria, Marlborough, NZ
Chardonnay
$6
Lindemann’s South Eastern Australia
House White
$6
Bella Civetta, Italy
Pinot Noir
$12/44
Pike Road, Willamette Valley, OR
Pinot Noir
$8/28
Tortoise Creek, Oakville, CA
Malbec
$8/28
Santa Julia, Mendoza, ARG
Cabernet Sauvignon
$12/44
Ringbolt, Margaret River, AUS
House Red
$6
Bella Civetta, Italy
Contact Us and Sign up for Updates
Send us a brief message regarding your service request, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

Smitty's Taphouse & Grill
6265 Old Water Oak Rd
Suite 101,
Tallahassee, Florida 32312
(850) 765-5647

View Full Beer List
Order Now
